db:article.db:para: webOS Open Source Edition (webOS OSE) is an open-source edition of LGâ€™s webOS, a web-centric and usability-focused software platform for smart devices. It supports development using both modern web application frameworks as well as native technologies including Qt and the QML language.

db:section.db:title: Supported Platforms and Versions
db:section.db:para: webOS OSE version 2.15.0 is supported for Qt 6. The reference hardware is Raspberry Pi 4, the main platform used by the community. Supported development host is Ubuntu 20.04.

db:section.db:title: Further Reading
db:section.db:para: Read more about webOS OSE at https://www.webosose.org/.
